about_the_game:
The sequel for Idle Dice is here!
Idle Dice 2 expands on the gameplay of its predecessor and adds more things:

MORE DICE
Up to 25 dice to upgrade independently

MORE CARDS
The basic set of cards is too boring for you? Idle Dice 2 features cards that don't exist in the real world. Why limit yourself to 13 cards if you could draw the whole alphabet?

CREATE YOUR DECK
You can choose which card to add to your deck to master various challenges.

FAIR
Like all my games, watching ads is entirely optional and the game is balanced to play without the need to spend money to progress.

and most importantly:
DARK MODE
The most requested feature for Idle Dice 1 is finally here!!


The game is still being developed and more content will get added. Be part of the development by joining the discord server and give feedback.
